description: A mind-blowing, erotic horror, Evil Movement’s Succubus stars Raven Riley and Liz Vicious nearly as good and evil adversaries whose origin stems from a really historic story. Lilith (Liz Vicious), the fabled first spouse of Adam, has been awoken from her slumber with a renewed lust for blood. As a consequence of her defiance of God, Lilith was damned to everlasting punishment by having to stroll the Earth as a succubus demon feeding on the power and lust of harmless folks. Legend tells that solely the eldest daughter within the bloodline of Eve herself has the facility to cease Lilith. That chosen one is Raven Riley. She is the one who bears the mark and she or he will be unable to return to peace till she has slain the succubus
title: Succubus
